short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: JSON & XML Converter allows you to easily and quickly convert between JSON and XML formats right from your browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: JSON & XML Converter is a simple, yet powerful extension that brings the ability to convert JSON to XML and XML to JSON right in your Chrome browser. Just paste your JSON or XML in the input field, press the button, and voila! Your data is converted. This extension also ensures your data stays on your browser and does not get sent to any external servers, thus safeguarding your privacy.
